questions.question: What is the definition of the word intelligent?
choices: A. Having a high level of intelligence and mental capacity
B. Having a low level of intelligence and mental capacity
C. Having average intelligence and mental capacity
D. Having no intelligence or mental capacity

questions.question: What is the synonym of intelligent?
What is the antonym of intelligent?
What is a common example of an intelligent person?
choices: A. A person who excels in academics
B. A person who is always making mistakes
C. A person with a low IQ
D. A person who lacks knowledge

questions.question: What is a characteristic of an intelligent person?
